amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to give college campuses the opportunity to offer alternative justice response programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Rouda.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
